extension.author: Omar Muhammad

field.name: width
field.label: Width
field.description: Width of the (image/flash) (in pixles), leave empty to use the default width

field.name: height
field.label: Height
field.description: Height of the (image/flash) (in pixles), leave empty to use the default height

field.name: txt1
field.label: Text Above
field.description: An optional text to put above the (image/flash), leave empty for no text

field.name: txt2
field.label: Text Below
field.description: An optional text to put below the (image/flash), leave empty for no text

field.name: alt_txt
field.label: Alternate Text
field.description: Text to display when mouseover the image, leave empty to disable

field.name: page
field.label: Link Type
field.description: when you click the image, it opens the link in either a new window or in the same window

field.name: opacity
field.label: Image Opcaity
field.description: Opacity of Image (integer from 0 to 100), leave empty for a fully opaque image

field.name: opacity2
field.label: Image Opcaity On Mouse Over
field.description: Opacity of Image when the user puts the mouse over it (integer from 0 to 100), leave empty to keep the same opacity

field.name: name
field.label: Flash Name/ID
field.description: Identifies the Flash movie to the host environment.

field.name: quality
field.label: Flash Quality
field.description: Quality setting to use in the Flash Player.

field.name: loop
field.label: Flash Looping
field.description: Specifies whether the Flash movie repeats indefinitely or stops when it reaches the last frame.

field.name: wmode
field.label: Flash Mode
field.description: Sets the Window Mode property of the Flash movie for transparency, layering, and positioning in the browser.
